#summary All the things that changed in 3.1.2

= Introduction =
Seaside 3.1.2 is a not yet released bug fix release for Seaside 3.1.


= Bugs Fixed =

The following bugs were fixed:
 *  Issue 794: 	WARestfulComponentFilter does not check for expired sessions
 *  Issue 795:    Update http://www.seaside.st/download/pharo to reflect no Seaside Menu
 *  Issue 797:	Seaside-JSON-Core extends BlockClosure but BlockClosure is not a portable class
 *  Issue 800:	Seaside json needs a positionable stream to do its parsing
